about_the_game:
It’s the soundtrack of Stellar Commanders, in MP3 format. seven Tracks in a 14 Minutes futuristic, sci-fi EP soundscape.

If you like the Music of Stellar Commanders, please consider getting the OST to and directly support Michel Barengo, the artist as well as the dev team for the fantastic work on this custom soundtrack.

Tracklist:

1. Introduction (0:46)
2. Choose your Set (1:07)
3. Preparation (2:09)
4. War Phase (5:01)
5. Planet Collapse (2:06)
6. Was it worth it (2:04)
7. Bonus Track - Music from the Trailer (0:54)

Please Note: once purchased, the soundtrack will appear in the game’s root installation directory under “DLC”.
detailed_description:
It’s the soundtrack of Stellar Commanders, in MP3 format. seven Tracks in a 14 Minutes futuristic, sci-fi EP soundscape.

If you like the Music of Stellar Commanders, please consider getting the OST to and directly support Michel Barengo, the artist as well as the dev team for the fantastic work on this custom soundtrack.

Tracklist:

1. Introduction (0:46)
2. Choose your Set (1:07)
3. Preparation (2:09)
4. War Phase (5:01)
5. Planet Collapse (2:06)
6. Was it worth it (2:04)
7. Bonus Track - Music from the Trailer (0:54)

Please Note: once purchased, the soundtrack will appear in the game’s root installation directory under “DLC”.
